zh.title: 比特币/美元技术分析：[短期震荡整理，待突破关键水平]
zh.content:
目前比特币/美元在64176.91美元附近震荡整理，呈现出一定的横盘走势。尽管价格出现小幅回调，但整体仍处于强势区域，短期内可能会继续在高位区间内波动。市场情绪偏向谨慎，等待进一步的技术确认。

从技术指标来看，RSI(14)数据缺失，因此无法做出准确的超买超卖判断。MACD值为负（-570.34668），显示出短期内卖方力量较强，但信号线数据未显示，导致趋势不够明确。20日简单移动平均线(SMA)为65337.24，表明价格仍然在这一水平附近遭遇压制。

支撑位方面，当前的低点63412.01可能成为短期内重要的支撑区域，一旦跌破此位，可能会引发进一步的下跌。而阻力位则在64906附近，突破此水平可能会吸引更多买盘，推动价格上行。

建议投资者保持观望，耐心等待突破关键技术水平。若价格突破64906阻力位，可以考虑适度介入多单；反之，如果跌破63412支撑位，则可能需要考虑调整仓位或止损。

en.title: Bitcoin vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The BTC/USD market shows a bearish trend in the short term, as evidenced by the price dip of 1.12% over the last 24 hours. The price has retraced from its recent high of $64,906, trading closer to the low of $63,412. The current price of $64,176.91 reflects a consolidation phase, with the market facing potential resistance near the SMA(20) at $65,337. If the price continues to struggle below this level, further downside may be expected.

The absence of a clear RSI(14) reading leaves uncertainty about the strength of momentum. Meanwhile, the MACD reading at -570.35 signals potential bearish pressure, but without a definitive signal line, it is hard to gauge whether this is part of a broader trend reversal or just a short-term pullback. The market might be experiencing negative divergence if we see more bearish activity in the coming days, so traders should remain cautious.

Support levels are forming around $63,400, with the possibility of further downside if this level fails to hold. A break below this could open the door for a deeper retracement toward $62,000. Conversely, if the price stabilizes and the bulls manage to reclaim the $65,000 level, the market could potentially target the $66,000 range, forming a more bullish outlook. Traders should be alert for a breakout or breakdown in either direction.

Given the current market conditions, it may be wise to adopt a wait-and-see approach until clearer trend signals emerge. A break above $65,337 could present a buying opportunity, while a sustained drop below $63,400 would warrant a more cautious stance. Scalpers and short-term traders could look for smaller price movements, while longer-term traders may prefer waiting for a confirmed trend.
